mapper.insert: insert into fm_product(p_name, p_filename, p_price, p_unit, p_weight, p_delivery, p_package, p_allergy, p_limitdate, p_type, p_tag, p_system_filename, midx_mp, p_secondname) values(#{p_name}, #{p_filename}, #{p_price}, #{p_unit}, #{p_weight}, #{p_delivery}, #{p_package}, #{p_allergy}, #{p_limitdate}, #{p_type}, #{p_tag}, #{p_system_filename}, #{midx_mp}, #{p_secondname})
mapper.select: select * from fm_product a inner join fm_member b on a.midx_mp = b.midx where a.midx_mp = #{midx} and a.p_delyn = 'N'
mapper.update: update fm_product set p_delyn = 'Y' where pidx= #{pidx}
mapper.select: select * from fm_product a inner join fm_product_cart b on a.pidx = b.pidx_pc inner join fm_order c on b.pbidx = c.pbidx_co inner join fm_member d on c.midx_mo = d.midx inner join fm_del e on c.oidx=e.oidx_od where d.member_delyn like 'N' and pidx=#{pidx}
select * from fm_product where p_admincheck='N' and p_delyn='N'
mapper.update: update fm_product set p_admincheck = 'Y' where pidx= #{pidx}
update fm_member set member_grade = 1 where midx= #{midx}
update fm_member set member_delyn = 'F', member_delyndate = now() where midx=#{midx}
mapper.select: select * from fm_product a inner join fm_product_cart b on a.pidx = b.pidx_pc inner join fm_order c on b.pbidx = c.pbidx_co inner join fm_member d on c.midx_mo = d.midx inner join fm_del e on c.oidx=e.oidx_od where d.member_delyn like 'N' and pidx=#{pidx}
